item.title: Arch Linux i3wm Install Guide
item.description:
This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with:

  • i3WM
  • xorg
  • lightDM
  • Paru
  • BTRFS file system including subvolumes.
  • Snapper.
  • Snap-pac-grub.
  • Bootable snapshots.
  • Qemu/kvm with iommu setup.
  • Gaming.
